overall_perception_summary.headline: The Clinical Null
overall_perception_summary.description: Vanicream executes a strategy of radical subtraction, defining itself not by what it adds, but by what it removes. It serves as the ultimate safe harbor for the reactive skin customer, trading aesthetic pleasure for absolute physiological peace. It is the medical authority that promises silence for the skin.

foundation.title: The Safe Harbor
foundation.description: The brand acts as The Guardian, deriving authority from clinical validation and NEA acceptance to protect the skin barrier. Its Safety First values dictate a ruthless elimination of irritants ('Free of dyes, fragrance, lanolin'). Positioned as The Medical Authority, it offers a sterile, utility-focused promise: hydration without reaction.

identity.title: The Stoic Caregiver
identity.description: The personality is The Reliable Expert—distant, professional, and devoid of fluff. Dominated by the Caregiver archetype (70%), it signals protection through stability and medical consensus. Visually, it adheres to the Pharma-Code: sterile whites, medical blues, and dense text lists that signal 'hospital grade' safety.

communication.title: The Evidence List
communication.description: Messaging follows The Chemist territory, hooking the user with ingredients and persuading via exclusion lists ('No parabens'). The USP is The Specialist, targeting the specific 'sensitive skin' niche. Proof is established through Formula Purity (checklists of what isn't there) rather than before/after transformation.

benefits.title: Physiological Silence
benefits.description: Functionally, it delivers Hydration by maintaining moisture balance and locking it in. Emotionally, it provides Relief / Safety—the absence of worry or itch. It serves The Pragmatist who rejects marketing hype for a 'Tool' that works, acting as The Safe Choice for the risk-averse.

marker_1.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] ORIGIN OF AUTHORITY (The Source of Power)
marker_1.reasoning: The brand's authority is rooted purely in the clinic—'Dermatologist Tested' and 'National Eczema Association' badges are the primary trust signals (Origin: 1/5 Clinical). The mission is not to cure a disease but to maintain a barrier—'Daily Facial Moisturizer' and 'Lock in moisture' signal protection and maintenance rather than aggressive repair (Mission: 3/5 Maintenance).
marker_1.evidence: National Eczema Association Accepted... Dermatologist Tested... Helps to hydrate and lock in moisture... Daily Facial Moisturizer

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Clinical) + Slider B (3/5 Maintenance) aligns perfectly with Territory 2 - The Guardian. The focus is on clinical protection and barrier maintenance.

marker_2.reasoning: The scope is laser-focused on individual skin health, specifically for sensitive types—it treats the person, not the planet (Scope: 1/5 Micro). Access is democratic; this is a 'Daily' product for 'Your Family,' packaged in a standard tube without prestige signaling (Access: 5/5 Democratic).
marker_2.evidence: For Sensitive Skin... Caring for your family's skin since 1975... Suitable for all skin types

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Skin Focus) + Slider B (5/5 Democratic) maps to Territory 1 - The Democratizers.

marker_3.reasoning: Performance priority is unequivocally safety. The defining feature is the absence of 'dyes, fragrance, masking fragrance, lanolin, parabens & formaldehyde releasers' (Performance: 1/5 Hypoallergenic). Transparency is high via the 'Spec Sheet' approach—listing every excluded irritant on the front of the pack (Information: 1/5 Spec Sheet).
marker_3.evidence: Free of dyes, fragrance, masking fragrance, lanolin, parabens & formaldehyde releasers... Non-comedogenic... Gluten-free

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Safety) + Slider B (1/5 Data/Spec Sheet) perfectly matches Territory 1 - Safety First.

marker_4.reasoning: The aesthetic is aggressively sterile—white background, standard blue sans-serif text, and zero 'lifestyle' props beyond a generic smiling family (Aesthetic: 1/5 Sterile). The value proposition is utility: a 3oz tube that works for the whole family, positioned as a necessary tool rather than a luxury (Value: 1/5 Utility).
marker_4.evidence: Clinical, minimal, and trustworthy... White background... 3 fl oz (89 mL)... Caring for your family's skin

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Sterile) + Slider B (1/5 Utility) matches Territory 1 - The Medical Authority.

marker_5.reasoning: The brand is professional and distant; even the family image feels like stock photography for an insurance company rather than intimate warmth (Warmth: 2/5 Distant). Authority is absolute, anchored by 'Dermatologist Tested' and the 'National Eczema Association' seal (Authority: 5/5 Deity).
marker_5.evidence: DERMATOLOGIST TESTED... Accepted National Eczema Association... The most important ingredient is trust

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Distant) + Slider B (5/5 Deity) matches Territory 3 - The Reliable Expert.

marker_6.reasoning: The Caregiver is dominant (70%) because the entire PDP is an exercise in reassurance and protection ('Caring for your family,' 'Accepted by NEA'). The Sage (20%) appears in the rigorous transparency of the exclusion lists and factual tone. The Innocent (10%) provides the underlying promise of 'Purity' via the free-from claims. This mix creates The Guardian territory.
marker_6.evidence: Caring for your family's skin since 1975... National Eczema Association Accepted... Free of dyes, fragrance... The most important ingredient is trust

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Archetypes mix does not use slider grid.

marker_7.reasoning: The tone is grave and clinical. There are no jokes, no exclamation marks, and no slang. It is a list of facts and warnings ('Free of formaldehyde releasers'). Enthusiasm is minimal (1/5), and Humor is non-existent (1/5). It sounds like a prescription label.
marker_7.evidence: Free of dyes, fragrance, masking fragrance, lanolin, parabens & formaldehyde releasers... Non-comedogenic... Dermatologist Tested

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Humor (1) + Enthusiasm (1) + Formality (3) meets the hard rule for Territory 1 - The Clinical Authority.

marker_8.reasoning: The visual language is purely medical. The palette is stark white and navy blue (#005BAC). The layout relies on grids of icons and justified text lists. Even the lifestyle images are clean and controlled. It signals 'Hospital' rather than 'Home'.
marker_8.evidence: White background... Navy blue text... Grid of nine ingredient exclusion icons... Clinical, minimal, and trustworthy
marker_8.look_and_feel: Clinical, minimal, and trustworthy; a pharmaceutical aesthetic.
marker_8.distinctive_assets: NEA Seal, Blue checkmark icons, Grid of 'Free-From' circles, Navy Blue sans-serif typography, White clinical background
marker_8.primary_palette: Clinical white base with Navy Blue text and Green accents.

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Sterile) + Slider B (1/5 Swiss Grid) aligns perfectly with Territory 1 - Pharma-Code.

marker_9.reasoning: The hook targets the components—'Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid and 5 Key Ceramides'. It assumes the user understands these ingredients. The persuasion is raw data/logic—a checklist of what is *not* in the product (Persuasion: 1/5 Raw Data/Rational). It convinces via the exclusion list.
marker_9.evidence: Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid and 5 Key Ceramides... Free of dyes, fragrance... Dermatologist Tested

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Component) + Slider B (1/5 Rational) matches Territory 1 - The Chemist.

marker_10.reasoning: There is no founder story. The protagonist is the collective authority of 'Dermatologists'. The setting is implied to be a sterile lab where formulas are tested and irritants are removed. It is an institutional narrative, not a personal one.
marker_10.evidence: DERMATOLOGIST TESTED... Accepted National Eczema Association... Caring for your family's skin since 1975

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Nobel) + Slider B (1/5 Sterile) matches Territory 1 - The Lab Breakthrough.

marker_11.reasoning: The primary validator is The Board—'Dermatologist Tested' and NEA. However, the *structure* of the proof is 'The List'. The product is defined by the 9 icons of things it does *not* contain (Dyes, Fragrance, Lanolin, etc.). The checklist is the truth.
marker_11.evidence: Accepted National Eczema Association... Dermatologist Tested... Free of dyes, fragrance, masking fragrance, lanolin, parabens & formaldehyde releasers

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Board) + Slider B (4/5 List) matches Territory 2 - Formula Purity.

marker_12.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] THE OWNERSHIP CLAIM (What Makes You Unique)
marker_12.reasoning: Vanicream doesn't claim a proprietary molecule; it claims commodity ingredients (Hyaluronic, Ceramides) and 'Free Of' status (Ownership: 1/5 Commodity). Its edge is its hyper-focus on the 'Sensitive Skin' and 'Eczema' niche. It owns the diagnosis, not the technology (Scope: 5/5 Specialist).
marker_12.evidence: For Sensitive Skin... Accepted National Eczema Association... Free of common chemical irritants

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Commodity) + Slider B (5/5 Specialist) matches Territory 4 - The Specialist.

marker_13.reasoning: The content depth is educational—using icons and lists to explain exactly what is excluded and why. The intent is trust-building (Thesis), explicitly stated: 'The most important ingredient is trust.' It prioritizes credibility over hard commerce.
marker_13.evidence: The most important ingredient is trust... Free of common chemical irritants... Icon grid

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Explainer) + Slider B (1/5 Thesis) matches Territory 1 - Science Education.

marker_14.reasoning: The product is a 'Daily Facial Moisturizer' aimed at maintenance ('Lock in moisture'). While it serves sensitive skin, the functional mechanism is hydration and barrier support (Action: 3/5 Maintenance). The goal is biological health—restoring the lipid barrier with ceramides, not aesthetic perfection (Outcome: 1/5 Biological).
marker_14.evidence: Helps to hydrate and lock in moisture... 5 Key Ceramides... Hyaluronic Acid... Non-greasy

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (3/5 Maintenance) + Slider B (1/5 Biological) matches Territory 3 - Hydration.

marker_15.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Panic Mode (Urgent need to stop pain/itch/reaction)
marker_15.slider_b_position_name: ▼ Sanctuary (I feel safe inside my own body)
marker_15.reasoning: The emotional promise is the absence of a negative. It offers relief from the anxiety of a skin reaction ('Free of irritants'). It provides a sanctuary where the user feels safe using a product on their face, removing the fear of a flare-up.
marker_15.evidence: Free of common chemical irritants... The most important ingredient is trust... For Sensitive Skin

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Panic/Relief) + Slider B (1/5 Sanctuary) matches Territory 1 - Relief / Safety.

marker_16.slider_a_position_name: ▼ The Tool (I buy it only because it functions)
marker_16.slider_b_position_name: ▼ The Standard (What everyone uses; the default)
marker_16.reasoning: Vanicream is an anti-badge. You don't buy it to show off; you buy it because it works (Tool: 1/5). It signals rationality and pragmatism—choosing a product for its function and safety profile rather than its brand cachet (Tribal: 1/5 Standard).
marker_16.evidence: Daily Facial Moisturizer... Caring for your family... The most important ingredient is trust

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Tool) + Slider B (1/5 Standard) matches Territory 1 - The Pragmatist.

marker_17.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Acceptance (I want to be accepted by the group)
marker_17.reasoning: This is the safest choice on the shelf. It signals 'I am sensible' and 'I prioritize health.' By choosing Vanicream, the user joins the majority of sensible people who listen to their dermatologists. It offers the social comfort of being undeniably correct and risk-free.
marker_17.evidence: Caring for your family's skin since 1975... Suitable for all skin types... Dermatologist Tested

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Acceptance) + Slider B (1/5 Majority) matches Territory 1 - The Safe Choice.
